name: Pharus
description:
"Pharus" is a fantasy adventure game. You're a Forest Spirit and you're trying to help other beings living in the area. 

Move: AD or Arrows(left/right)

Change layer: QE or JL or <>

Use/pick something: ENTER or SHIFT or K

Jump: SPACE or W or Up Arrow

Code, Unity: Szymon Rzosinski

Art: Kamila "yreron" Chmielowiec, Marta Hyzopska

Music, Sound Design: Justyna "Juice Tea" Kryscio

What does PHARUS mean?

It's a "lighthouse" in Latin.

GAME MADE ON "BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2021.1
